name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: author_date
description: Author date (when the original author made the commit).

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in SortingHat profile.

name: author_id
description: Author Id from SortingHat.

name: author_max_date
description: Date of most recent commit made by this author.

name: author_min_date
description: Date of the first commit made by this author.

name: author_name
description: Author name.

name: author_org_name
description: Organization name.

name: author_uuid
description: Author UUID from SortingHat.

name: commit_date
description: Date when committer made this commit.

name: committer_domain
description: Committer domain.

name: committer_name
description: Committer name.

name: demography_max_date
description: Date of the latest contribution (commit) of the corresponding author. Available only when demography study is active.

name: demography_min_date
aggregatable: Date of the first (oldest) contribution (commit) of the corresponding author. Available only when demography study is active.

name: files
description: Number of files touched by this commit.

name: github_repo
description: GitHub repository, if applies.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Commit date (when the original author made the commit).

name: hash
description: Commit hash.

name: hash_short
description: Shorten commit hash.

name: is_git_commit
description: Field containing '1' that allows to sum fields when concatenating with other indexes.

name: lines_added
description: Number of lines added by this commit.

name: lines_changed
description: Number of lines changed by this commit.

name: lines_removed
description: Number of lines removed by this commit.

name: message_analyzed
description: Commit message split by terms to allow searching.

name: message
description: Commit message as a single String.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the item was enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich information.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in RAW index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated in its original data source.

name: ocean-unique-id
description: Unique identifier for all of the datasets in the information lake.

name: origin
description: Original URL where the repository was retrieved from.

name: project_1
description: Project (if more than one level is allowed in project hierarchy)

name: project
description: Project.

name: branches
description: List of branches where the commit appears.

name: repo_name
description: Repository name.

name: tag
description: Perceval tag.

name: title
description: Commit title.

name: tz
description: Timezone in which the commit was made by its original author.

name: utc_author
description: Author date in UTC.

name: utc_commit
description: Commit date in UTC.

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.

name: time_to_commit_hours
description: Time in hours from author date (when commit was originally created) to commit date (when the commit was made to the repository).
